  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"service":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Backup","Storage"],"type":"string","description":"[Backup - Backup, Storage - Storage]","example":"Backup"},{"enum":[-12,-11],"type":"integer","description":"[-12 - Backup, -11 - Storage]","example":-12,"x-enum-varnames":["Backup","Storage"],"x-enum-descriptions":["Backup","Storage"]}],"description":"The wallet service type.","title":"TenantWalletService"},"enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the wallet service is enabled.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for changing the tenant wallet service state.","title":"ChangeWalletServiceStateRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
